MS.S: PowerShell module with commands for discovering, installing, updating and publishing the PowerShell artifacts like Modules, Scripts, and DSC Resources.

## 1.0.5_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fixes_x000D__x000A_- Update `nuget.config` to use PowerShell packages feed (#1649)_x000D__x000A_- Refactor V2ServerAPICalls and NuGetServerAPICalls to use object-oriented query/filter builder (#1645 Thanks @sean-r-williams!)_x000D__x000A_- Fix unnecessary `and` for version globbing in V2ServerAPICalls (#1644 Thanks again @sean-r-williams!)_x000D__x000A_- Fix requiring `tags` in server response (#1627 Thanks @evelyn-bi!)_x000D__x000A_- Add 10 minute timeout to HTTPClient (#1626)_x000D__x000A_- Fix save script without `-IncludeXml` (#1609, #1614 Thanks @o-l-a-v!)_x000D__x000A_- PAT token fix to translate into HttpClient 'Basic Authorization'(#1599 Thanks @gerryleys!)_x000D__x000A_- Fix incorrect request url when installing from ADO (#1597 Thanks @antonyoni!)_x000D__x000A_- Improved exception handling (#1569)_x000D__x000A_- Ensure that .NET methods are not called in order to enable use in Constrained Language Mode (#1564)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.4.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- PSResourceGet packaging update_x000D__x000A_ _x000D__x000A_## 1.0.4_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Patch_x000D__x000A_- Dependency package updates_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.3_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fixes_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for null package version in `Install-PSResource`_x000D__x000A_ _x000D__x000A_## 1.0.2_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fixes_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for `Update-PSResource` not updating from correct repository (#1549)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for creating temp home directory on Unix (#1544)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for creating `InstalledScriptInfos` directory when it does not exist (#1542)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for `Update-ModuleManifest` throwing null pointer exception (#1538)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for `name` property not populating in `PSResourceInfo` object when using `Find-PSResource` with JFrog Artifactory (#1535)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for incorrect configuration of requests to JFrog Artifactory v2 endpoints (#1533 Thanks @sean-r-williams!)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for determining JFrog Artifactory repositories (#1532 Thanks @sean-r-williams!)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for v2 server repositories incorrectly adding script endpoint (1526)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fixes for null references (#1525)_x000D__x000A_- Typo fixes in message prompts in `Install-PSResource` (#1510 Thanks @NextGData!)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix to add `NormalizedVersion` property to `AdditionalMetadata` only when it exists (#1503 Thanks @sean-r-williams!)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix to verify whether `Uri` is a UNC path and set respective `ApiVersion` (#1479 Thanks @kborowinski!)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fixes_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix to update Unix local user installation paths to be compatible with .NET 7 and .NET 8 (#1464)_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix for Import-PSGetRepository in Windows PowerShell (#1460)_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix for Test-PSScriptFileInfo to be less sensitive to whitespace (#1457)_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix to overwrite rels/rels directory on net472 when extracting nupkg to directory (#1456)_x000D__x000A_- Bugfix to add pipeline by property name support for Name and Repository properties for Find-PSResource (#1451 Thanks @ThomasNieto!)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_## 1.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### New Features_x000D__x000A_- Add `ApiVersion` parameter for `Register-PSResourceRepository` (#1431)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Bug Fixes_x000D__x000A_- Automatically set the ApiVersion to v2 for repositories imported from PowerShellGet (#1430)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix ADO v2 feed installation failures (#1429)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix Artifactory v2 endpoint failures (#1428)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix Artifactory v3 endpoint failures (#1427)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix `-RequiredResource` silent failures (#1426)_x000D__x000A_- Bug fix for v2 repository returning extra packages for `-Tag` based search with `-Prerelease` (#1405) _x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_See change log (CHANGELOG.md)
